name: G√©n√©rer des images avec un inpainting r√©aliste en utilisant Simbrams Ri AI
description:
# G√©n√©rer des images avec un inpainting r√©aliste en utilisant Simbrams Ri AI

Ce workflow n8n s'int√®gre au **mod√®le `simbrams/ri` de Replicate** pour g√©n√©rer des images. Il prend une image d'entr√©e et un masque, applique des transformations en fonction de vos param√®tres, et renvoie automatiquement le r√©sultat final g√©n√©r√©.

---

## üìå Section 1 : D√©clencheur & Authentification

### ‚ö° En cliquant sur ‚ÄòEx√©cuter‚Äô (D√©clencheur manuel)

* **Objectif** : D√©marre le workflow manuellement.
* **Avantage** : Utile pour les tests et les ex√©cutions √† la demande.

### üîë D√©finir la cl√© API (N≈ìud de configuration)

* **Objectif** : Stocke votre **cl√© API Replicate** √† l'int√©rieur du workflow.
* **Avantage** : Garde les identifiants s√©curis√©s et garantit que d'autres n≈ìuds peuvent les r√©utiliser.

---

## üìå Section 2 : Envoi de la demande de g√©n√©ration d'image

### üñºÔ∏è Cr√©er une pr√©diction (N≈ìud de requ√™te HTTP)

* **Objectif** : Envoie une requ√™te POST √† l'API de Replicate pour commencer √† g√©n√©rer une image.
* **Param√®tres d'entr√©e** :

  * **image** : URL de l'image d'entr√©e
  * **mask** : URL de l'image masque
  * **seed** : Contr√¥le de la randomisation (pour la reproductibilit√©)
  * **steps** : Nombre d'√©tapes de raffinement
  * **strength** : Intensit√© de la modification (0‚Äì1)
  * **blur\_mask** : Indique s'il faut flouter les bords du masque
  * **merge\_m\_s** : Indique s'il faut fusionner le masque avec la source
* **Avantage** : Donne un contr√¥le total sur la fa√ßon dont le mod√®le modifie votre image.

### üÜî Extraire l'ID de pr√©diction (N≈ìud de code)

* **Objectif** : Extrait l'**ID de pr√©diction**, le **statut** et l'**URL** de la r√©ponse de Replicate.
* **Avantage** : N√©cessaire pour v√©rifier le statut de la g√©n√©ration plus tard.

---

## üìå Section 3 : Polling & Attente

### ‚è≥ Attendre (N≈ìud d'attente)

* **Objectif** : Met en pause le workflow pendant 2 secondes avant de v√©rifier √† nouveau.
* **Avantage** : Emp√™che de frapper l'API de Replicate trop rapidement.

### üîÑ V√©rifier le statut de la pr√©diction (N≈ìud de requ√™te HTTP)

* **Objectif** : V√©rifie si la pr√©diction est compl√®te en utilisant l'ID de pr√©diction stock√©.
* **Avantage** : Automatise la surveillance de l'avancement du travail.

### ‚úÖ V√©rifier si complet (N≈ìud conditionnel)

* **Objectif** : D√©cide si la pr√©diction est termin√©e.
* **Chemins** :

  * **Vrai** ‚Üí Envoie le r√©sultat au traitement.
  * **Faux** ‚Üí Boucle de retour √† Attendre et continue de v√©rifier.
* **Avantage** : Garantit que le workflow ne se termine que lorsqu'une image valide est pr√™te.

---

## üìå Section 4 : Traitement du r√©sultat

### üì¶ Traiter le r√©sultat (N≈ìud de code)

* **Objectif** : Nettoie la r√©ponse API compl√©t√©e et extrait :

  * Statut
  * Sortie (image g√©n√©r√©e finale)
  * M√©triques
  * Horodatages de cr√©ation et de compl√©tion
  * Nom du mod√®le (`simbrams/ri`)
  * URL de l'**image finale**
* **Avantage** : Fournit un r√©sultat structur√© et pr√™t √† l'emploi pour l'affichage, le stockage ou l'automatisation suppl√©mentaire.

---

## üìä Tableau d'aper√ßu du workflow

| Section           | Nom du n≈ìud            | Objectif                              |
| ----------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| 1. D√©clencheur & Auth | En cliquant sur ‚ÄòEx√©cuter‚Äô   | D√©marre le workflow manuellement         |
|                   | D√©finir la cl√© API      | Stocke les identifiants API           |
| 2. Demande IA     | Cr√©er une pr√©diction    | Envoie la demande de g√©n√©ration d'image |
|                   | Extraire l'ID de pr√©diction | Extrait l'ID + statut pour le suivi    |
| 3. Polling        | Attendre                | Ajoute un d√©lai entre les v√©rifications |
|                   | V√©rifier le statut de la pr√©diction | Surveille l'avancement du travail      |
|                   | V√©rifier si complet     | Route en fonction de l'ach√®vement du travail |
| 4. R√©sultat       | Traiter le r√©sultat     | Extrait et nettoie la sortie finale    |

---

## üéØ Avantages cl√©s

* üîê **Authentification s√©curis√©e** avec gestion de la cl√© API.
* üñºÔ∏è **G√©n√©ration d'images personnalis√©es** avec des param√®tres tels que le masque, la force et les √©tapes.
* üîÑ **Polling automatique** garantit que les r√©sultats ne sont r√©cup√©r√©s que lorsqu'ils sont pr√™ts.
* üì¶ **Sortie structur√©e propre** avec l'URL de l'image finale pour une utilisation facile.

---

workflow.name: 3. Generate Images with Realistic Inpainting using Simbrams Ri AI

parameters.content:
## üìå Section 1: Trigger & Authentication

### ‚ö° On Clicking ‚ÄòExecute‚Äô (Manual Trigger)

* **Purpose**: Starts the workflow manually.
* **Benefit**: Useful for testing and running on demand.

### üîë Set API Key (Set Node)

* **Purpose**: Stores your **Replicate API key** inside the workflow.
* **Benefit**: Keeps credentials secure and ensures other nodes can reuse them.

---

=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# Generate Images with Realistic Inpainting using Simbrams Ri AI

This n8n workflow integrates with **Replicate‚Äôs `simbrams/ri` model** to generate images. It takes an input image and mask, applies transformations based on your parameters, and returns the final generated output automatically.

---

## üìå Section 1: Trigger & Authentication

### ‚ö° On Clicking ‚ÄòExecute‚Äô (Manual Trigger)

* **Purpose**: Starts the workflow manually.
* **Benefit**: Useful for testing and running on demand.

### üîë Set API Key (Set Node)

* **Purpose**: Stores your **Replicate API key** inside the workflow.
* **Benefit**: Keeps credentials secure and ensures other nodes can reuse them.

---

## üìå Section 2: Sending the Image Generation Request

### üñºÔ∏è Create Prediction (HTTP Request Node)

* **Purpose**: Sends a POST request to Replicate‚Äôs API to start generating an image.
* **Input Parameters**:

  * **image**: Input image URL
  * **mask**: Mask image URL
  * **seed**: Randomness control (for reproducibility)
  * **steps**: Number of refinement steps
  * **strength**: Intensity of modification (0‚Äì1)
  * **blur\_mask**: Whether to blur the mask edges
  * **merge\_m\_s**: Whether to merge mask with source
* **Benefit**: Gives full control over how the model modifies your image.

### üÜî Extract Prediction ID (Code Node)

* **Purpose**: Extracts the **Prediction ID**, **status**, and **URL** from Replicate‚Äôs response.
* **Benefit**: Required to check the status of the generation later.

---

## üìå Section 3: Polling & Waiting

### ‚è≥ Wait (Wait Node)

* **Purpose**: Pauses the workflow for 2 seconds before rechecking.
* **Benefit**: Prevents hitting Replicate‚Äôs API too quickly.

### üîÑ Check Prediction Status (HTTP Request Node)

* **Purpose**: Checks whether the prediction is complete using the stored Prediction ID.
* **Benefit**: Automates monitoring of job progress.

### ‚úÖ Check If Complete (If Node)

* **Purpose**: Decides if the prediction has finished.
* **Paths**:

  * **True** ‚Üí Sends result to processing.
  * **False** ‚Üí Loops back to Wait and keeps checking.
* **Benefit**: Ensures the workflow only ends when a valid image is ready.

---

## üìå Section 4: Processing the Result

### üì¶ Process Result (Code Node)

* **Purpose**: Cleans up the completed API response and extracts:

  * Status
  * Output (final generated image)
  * Metrics
  * Created & completed timestamps
  * Model name (`simbrams/ri`)
  * Final **image URL**
* **Benefit**: Delivers a structured and ready-to-use result for display, storage, or further automation.

---

## üìä Workflow Overview Table

| Section           | Node Name               | Purpose                              |
| ----------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------ |
| 1. Trigger & Auth | On Clicking ‚ÄòExecute‚Äô   | Starts the workflow manually         |
|                   | Set API Key             | Stores API credentials               |
| 2. AI Request     | Create Prediction       | Sends image generation request       |
|                   | Extract Prediction ID   | Extracts ID + status for tracking    |
| 3. Polling        | Wait                    | Adds delay between checks            |
|                   | Check Prediction Status | Monitors job progress                |
|                   | Check If Complete       | Routes based on job completion       |
| 4. Result         | Process Result          | Extracts and cleans the final output |

---

## üéØ Key Benefits

* üîê **Secure authentication** with API key management.
* üñºÔ∏è **Custom image generation** with parameters like mask, strength, and steps.
* üîÑ **Automatic polling** ensures results are fetched only when ready.
* üì¶ **Clean structured output** with final image URL for easy use.

---

## üìå Section 2: Sending the Image Generation Request

### üñºÔ∏è Create Prediction (HTTP Request Node)

* **Purpose**: Sends a POST request to Replicate‚Äôs API to start generating an image.
* **Input Parameters**:

  * **image**: Input image URL
  * **mask**: Mask image URL
  * **seed**: Randomness control (for reproducibility)
  * **steps**: Number of refinement steps
  * **strength**: Intensity of modification (0‚Äì1)
  * **blur\_mask**: Whether to blur the mask edges
  * **merge\_m\_s**: Whether to merge mask with source
* **Benefit**: Gives full control over how the model modifies your image.

### üÜî Extract Prediction ID (Code Node)

* **Purpose**: Extracts the **Prediction ID**, **status**, and **URL** from Replicate‚Äôs response.
* **Benefit**: Required to check the status of the generation later.

---

## üìå Section 3: Polling & Waiting

### ‚è≥ Wait (Wait Node)

* **Purpose**: Pauses the workflow for 2 seconds before rechecking.
* **Benefit**: Prevents hitting Replicate‚Äôs API too quickly.

### üîÑ Check Prediction Status (HTTP Request Node)

* **Purpose**: Checks whether the prediction is complete using the stored Prediction ID.
* **Benefit**: Automates monitoring of job progress.

### ‚úÖ Check If Complete (If Node)

* **Purpose**: Decides if the prediction has finished.
* **Paths**:

  * **True** ‚Üí Sends result to processing.
  * **False** ‚Üí Loops back to Wait and keeps checking.
* **Benefit**: Ensures the workflow only ends when a valid image is ready.

---

## üìå Section 4: Processing the Result

### üì¶ Process Result (Code Node)

* **Purpose**: Cleans up the completed API response and extracts:

  * Status
  * Output (final generated image)
  * Metrics
  * Created & completed timestamps
  * Model name (`simbrams/ri`)
  * Final **image URL**
* **Benefit**: Delivers a structured and ready-to-use result for display, storage, or further automation.

---

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
